products.name: Astral Projection Tee
products.description: A heavyweight cotton tee featuring a distorted astral graphic. Made for interdimensional travel. Pure 240gsm cotton.

products.name: Void Walker Tee
products.description: Step into the void with this premium oversized tee. Features abstract void patterns and a relaxed drop shoulder fit.

products.name: Neon Dreams Tee
products.description: Cyberpunk-inspired neon graphic tee with reflective print. Glows under UV light for maximum impact.

products.name: Digital Decay Tee
products.description: Distressed digital print representing the beauty in technological entropy. Washed vintage finish.

products.name: Cosmic Static Tee
products.description: All-over static noise print inspired by cosmic background radiation. Ultra-soft 300gsm cotton blend.

products.name: Midnight Protocol Tee
products.description: Encrypted message graphic tee with hidden QR code details. For those who operate after dark.

products.name: Phantom Wave Tee
products.description: Sound wave visualization printed with gradient fade effect. Music meets fashion in this audio-inspired piece.

products.name: Binary Sunset Tee
products.description: Retro-futuristic sunset graphic with binary code elements. A tribute to sci-fi classics.

products.name: Glitch Art Tee
products.description: Digital glitch artwork printed on premium heavyweight cotton. Each piece features unique color distortions.

products.name: Quantum Flux Tee
products.description: Abstract quantum mechanics-inspired design. Features glow-in-the-dark ink accents for night visibility.

products.name: Glitch in Reality Hoodie
products.description: Oversized hoodie with pixelated embroidery. A comfortable layer for when reality feels a bit off. 100% French Terry.

products.name: Neural Network Hoodie
products.description: Complex neural pathway graphics wrap around this premium hoodie. Kangaroo pocket with hidden tech compartment.

products.name: Shadow Realm Hoodie
products.description: Deep black hoodie with subtle tonal shadow graphics. Double-lined hood for extra warmth and structure.

products.name: Electric Pulse Hoodie
products.description: EKG-inspired continuous line pattern with neon accents. Ribbed cuffs and hem for a snug fit.

products.name: Data Stream Hoodie
products.description: Matrix-style data rain printed on premium 400gsm fleece. Ultra-comfortable with a boxy silhouette.

products.name: Cyber Fog Hoodie
products.description: Gradient faded wash with circuit board prints emerging from the mist. Features oversized hood.

products.name: Zero Gravity Hoodie
products.description: Space program-inspired hoodie with floating astronaut embroidery. Reinforced stitching throughout.

products.name: Pixel Storm Hoodie
products.description: Retro gaming pixel art meets contemporary streetwear. All-over sublimation print in 8-bit glory.

products.name: Dark Matter Hoodie
products.description: Ultra-black fabric that absorbs light. Minimal branding with reflective logo details visible only in flash.

products.name: Frequency Shift Hoodie
products.description: Audio frequency visualization wraps the entire hoodie. Built-in earphone routing through the hood.

products.name: Cyber-Wash Baggy Jeans
products.description: Acid-washed baggy jeans with a futuristic fit. Features utility pockets and a relaxed silhouette for maximum comfort.

products.name: Void Black Baggy Jeans
products.description: Deep black overdyed denim with zero fade guarantee. Wide leg cut with reinforced knees.

products.name: Distortion Wash Jeans
products.description: Unique tie-dye wash creating one-of-a-kind patterns. Heavy 14oz selvedge denim construction.

products.name: Cargo Tech Jeans
products.description: Baggy jeans with modular cargo pockets. Water-resistant coating and adjustable ankle tabs.

products.name: Vintage Fade Jeans
products.description: Pre-distressed with authentic worn patterns. Relaxed fit through thigh with natural taper.

products.name: Double Knee Work Jeans
products.description: Workwear-inspired baggy jeans with reinforced double knee panels. Built for durability and style.

products.name: Graffiti Splash Jeans
products.description: Hand-painted graffiti splatter details make each pair unique. Street art meets high fashion.

products.name: Raw Edge Jeans
products.description: Unfinished raw hem with intentional fraying. Japanese selvedge denim in a relaxed wide leg cut.

products.name: Stone Wash Classic Jeans
products.description: Classic stone wash finish with high contrast fading. Timeless 90s silhouette updated for modern wear.

products.name: Reinforced Skate Jeans
products.description: Skater-approved baggy jeans with triple-stitched seams. Stretch denim blend for maximum mobility.
